Package noppes.npcs.api.event

package noppes.npcs.api.event

This package contains event classes whose instances are dispatched to the corresponding hook functions (if present) in CNPC scripts.

These classes represent different events that a script may listen to, e.g. when a player is initialized, an NPC is damaged, etc. Most scripts are written in a way that they listen to specific events, and then do specific actions.

To listen to an event in a script, a function with the hook function name of the corresponding event class and a parameter (usually named event or e) is written in the script. When the event is triggered, this function will be called with its only parameter set to an instance of the event class. For example, to listen to the NpcEvent.InitEvent event in an NPC script:

function init(e) {

}

In this example, init is the hook function name of the NpcEvent.InitEvent event. When the scripted NPC is initialized, this function will be called, and its parameter e will be set to an instance of the NpcEvent.InitEvent event class, which contains information about this event.

For the hook function name of each events, check its description.

Event classes with different "prefixes" are triggered in different scriptable objects. See their descriptions for details.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    noppes.npcs.api
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BlockEvent
    Represents an event triggered on scripted blocks (including scripted doors.)
    BlockEvent.BreakEvent
    Hook function name: broken
    Triggered when the scripted block is destroyed.
    BlockEvent.ClickedEvent
    Hook function name: clicked
    Triggered when a player starts destroying (default control: mouse left click) the scripted block.
    BlockEvent.CollidedEvent
    Hook function name: collide
    Triggered periodically when an entity collides with the scripted block.
    BlockEvent.DoorToggleEvent
    Hook function name: doorToggle
    Triggered when the scripted door is toggled.
    BlockEvent.EntityFallenUponEvent
    Hook function name: fallenUpon
    Triggered when an entity is fallen upon the scripted block.
    BlockEvent.ExplodedEvent
    Hook function name: exploded
    Triggered when the scripted block is destroyed by an explosion.
    BlockEvent.HarvestedEvent
    Hook function name: harvested
    Triggered when a player is done destroying (default control: mouse left click) the scripted block.
    BlockEvent.InitEvent
    Hook function name: init
    Triggered when the scripted block is placed or loaded, or at most 10 game ticks (0.5 seconds expected) after the block script is edited.
    BlockEvent.InteractEvent
    Hook function name: interact
    Triggered when a player interacts (default control: mouse right click) with the scripted block.
    BlockEvent.NeighborChangedEvent
    Hook function name: neighborChanged
    Triggered when a block is placed right next to the scripted block, the state of one of the neighbor blocks changes, or one of the neighbor blocks is destroyed.
    BlockEvent.RainFillEvent
    Hook function name: rainFilled
    Triggered at a probability of 1/4096 every game tick (triggered every 204.8 seconds expected in average) when the scripted block is exposed under rain.
    BlockEvent.RedstoneEvent
    Hook function name: redstone
    Triggered when the redstone power the scripted block receives changes.
    BlockEvent.TimerEvent
    Hook function name: timer
    Triggered when a timer on the scripted block is done.
    BlockEvent.UpdateEvent
    Hook function name: tick
    Triggered every 10 game ticks (0.5 seconds expected.)
    CustomGuiEvent
    Represents an event related to custom GUI, and triggered on players.
    CustomGuiEvent.ButtonEvent
    Hook function name: customGuiButton
    Triggered when a button in the custom GUI is pressed down by the player.
    CustomGuiEvent.CloseEvent
    Hook function name: customGuiClosed
    Triggered when the custom GUI is closed.
    CustomGuiEvent.ScrollEvent
    Hook function name: customGuiScroll
    Triggered when an item in a scroll component in the custom GUI is clicked.
    CustomGuiEvent.SlotClickEvent
    Hook function name: customGuiSlotClicked
    Triggered when an item slot in the custom GUI is clicked.
    CustomGuiEvent.SlotEvent
    Hook function name: customGuiSlot
    Triggered when the item stack in an item slot in the custom GUI is changed.
    CustomNPCsEvent
    Represents an event dispatched by CNPC to the scripts.
    DialogEvent
    Represents an event related to dialogs, and triggered on NPCs.
    DialogEvent.CloseEvent
    Hook function name: dialogClose
    Triggered when the dialog is closed.
    DialogEvent.OpenEvent
    Hook function name: dialog
    Triggered when the dialog is opened.
    DialogEvent.OptionEvent
    Hook function name: dialogOption
    Triggered when an option in the dialog is selected.
    ForgeEvent
    Varied hook function name (see detailed description)
    Represents an event triggered in the Forge script.
    ForgeEvent.EntityEvent
    Varied hook function name (see detailed description of ForgeEvent)
    Triggered when an event whose class is assignable to EntityEvent is fired.
    ForgeEvent.InitEvent
    Hook function name: init
    Triggered when the Forge script is initialized.
    ForgeEvent.LevelEvent
    Varied hook function name (see detailed description of ForgeEvent)
    Triggered when an event whose class is assignable to WorldEvent is fired.
    HandlerEvent
    Represents an event related to CNPC handlers.
    HandlerEvent.FactionsLoadedEvent
    Triggered when the factions are loaded.
    HandlerEvent.RecipesLoadedEvent
    Triggered when the custom recipes are loaded.
    ItemEvent
    Represents an event triggered on scripted items.
    ItemEvent.AttackEvent
    Hook function name: attack
    Triggered when a player starts destroying (default control: mouse left click) a block, attacks (default control: mouse left click) an entity or the air with the scripted item in the main hand.
    ItemEvent.InitEvent
    Hook function name: init
    Triggered when the scripted item is created, loaded, or thrown, or at most 10 game ticks after it is picked up or its script is edited.
    ItemEvent.InteractEvent
    Hook function name: interact
    Triggered when a player interacts (default control: mouse right click) with the scripted item in the main hand.
    ItemEvent.PickedUpEvent
    Hook function name: pickedUp
    Triggered when the scripted item is picked up.
    ItemEvent.SpawnEvent
    Hook function name: spawn
    Triggered when the entity for the scripted item is spawned.
    ItemEvent.TossedEvent
    Hook function name: tossed
    Triggered when the scripted item is thrown.
    ItemEvent.UpdateEvent
    Hook function name: tick
    Triggered every 10 game ticks (0.5 seconds expected) when the scripted item is in the player inventory.
    NpcEvent
    Represents an event triggered on NPCs.
    NpcEvent.CollideEvent
    Hook function name: collide
    Triggered every 4 game ticks (0.2 seconds expected) when another entity is within the hitbox of the NPC extended by 2 blocks in width and 1 block in height if the NPC is not riding an entity, or within the minimum hitbox that includes the hitboxes of both the NPC and the entity the NPC is riding, extended by 2 blocks in width.
    NpcEvent.DamagedEvent
    Hook function name: damaged
    Triggered when the NPC is damaged.
    NpcEvent.DiedEvent
    Hook function name: died
    Triggered when the NPC dies.
    NpcEvent.InitEvent
    Hook function name: init
    Triggered when the NPC is created, edited, loaded, reset, respawned, or when the NPC travels across dimensions, or 10 game ticks (0.5 seconds expected) after the NPC travels from the End to Overworld, or at most 10 game ticks after its script is edited.
    NpcEvent.InteractEvent
    Hook function name: interact
    Triggered when a player interacts (default control: mouse right click) with the NPC.
    NpcEvent.KilledEntityEvent
    Hook function name: kill
    Triggered when the NPC kills an entity.
    NpcEvent.MeleeAttackEvent
    Hook function name: meleeAttack
    Triggered when the NPC does a melee attack.
    NpcEvent.RangedLaunchedEvent
    Hook function name: rangedLaunched
    Triggered when the NPC does a ranged attack by shooting projectiles.
    NpcEvent.TargetEvent
    Hook function name: target
    Triggered when the NPC targets an entity.
    NpcEvent.TargetLostEvent
    Hook function name: targetLost
    Triggered when the NPC loses its target.
    NpcEvent.TimerEvent
    Hook function name: timer
    Triggered when a timer on the NPC is done.
    NpcEvent.UpdateEvent
    Hook function name: tick
    Triggered every 10 game ticks (0.5 seconds expected.)
    PlayerEvent
    Represents an event triggered on players.
    PlayerEvent.AttackEvent
    Hook function name: attack
    Triggered when the player starts destroying (default control: mouse left click) a block, attacks (default control: mouse left click) an entity or the air.
    PlayerEvent.BreakEvent
    Hook function name: broken
    Triggered when the player is done destroying (default control: mouse left click) a block.
    PlayerEvent.ChatEvent
    Hook function name: chat
    Triggered when the player sends a message in the chat.
    PlayerEvent.ContainerClosed
    Hook function name: containerClosed
    Triggered when the player closes a container.
    PlayerEvent.ContainerOpen
    Hook function name: containerOpen
    Triggered when the player opens a container.
    PlayerEvent.DamagedEntityEvent
    Hook function name: damagedEntity
    Triggered when the player deals damage to an entity.
    PlayerEvent.DamagedEvent
    Hook function name: damaged
    Triggered when the player is damaged.
    PlayerEvent.DiedEvent
    Hook function name: died
    Triggered when the player dies.
    PlayerEvent.FactionUpdateEvent
    Hook function name: factionUpdate
    Triggered when the faction point of the player changes or is initialized.
    PlayerEvent.InitEvent
    Hook function name: init
    Triggered when the player joins the world, respawns, or travels from the End to Overworld, or at most 10 game ticks (0.5 seconds expected) after the player script is edited.
    PlayerEvent.InteractEvent
    Hook function name: interact
    Triggered when the player interacts (default control: mouse right click) with a block, an entity, or an item.
    PlayerEvent.KeyPressedEvent
    Hook function name: keyPressed
    Triggered when the player presses down a key on the keyboard.
    PlayerEvent.KeyReleasedEvent
    Hook function name: keyReleased
    Triggered when the player releases a key on the keyboard.
    PlayerEvent.KilledEntityEvent
    Hook function name: kill
    Triggered when the player kills an entity.
    PlayerEvent.LevelUpEvent
    Hook function name: levelUp
    Triggered when the level of the player changes.
    PlayerEvent.LoginEvent
    Hook function name: login
    Triggered when the player logs in.
    PlayerEvent.LogoutEvent
    Hook function name: logout
    Triggered when the player logs out.
    PlayerEvent.PickUpEvent
    Hook function name: pickUp
    Triggered when the player picks up an item stack.
    PlayerEvent.PlaySoundEvent
    Hook function name: playSound
    Triggered when a sound is played to the player.
    PlayerEvent.RangedLaunchedEvent
    Hook function name: rangedLaunched
    Triggered when the player stops charging a bow or shoots with a crossbow.
    PlayerEvent.TimerEvent
    Hook function name: timer
    Triggered when a timer on the player is done.
    PlayerEvent.TossEvent
    Hook function name: toss
    Triggered when the player throws an item stack.
    PlayerEvent.UpdateEvent
    Hook function name: tick
    Triggered every 10 game ticks (0.5 seconds expected.)
    ProjectileEvent
    Represents an event triggered on projectiles.
    ProjectileEvent.ImpactEvent
    Hook function name: projectileImpact
    Triggered when the projectile hits a block or an entity.
    ProjectileEvent.UpdateEvent
    Hook function name: projectileTick
    Triggered every 5 game ticks (0.25 seconds expected.)
    QuestEvent
    Represents an event related to quests, and triggered on players.
    QuestEvent.QuestCompletedEvent
    Hook function name: questCompleted
    Triggered when the quest is completed by the player.
    QuestEvent.QuestStartEvent
    Hook function name: questStart
    Triggered when the quest is started for the player.
    QuestEvent.QuestTurnedInEvent
    Hook function name: questTurnIn
    Triggered when the quest is turned in by the player.
    RoleEvent
    Hook function name: role
    Represents an event related to roles, and triggered on NPCs.
    RoleEvent.BankUnlockedEvent
    Hook function name: role
    Triggered when a tab in the bank is unlocked.
    RoleEvent.BankUpgradedEvent
    Hook function name: role
    Triggered when a tab in the bank is upgraded.
    RoleEvent.FollowerFinishedEvent
    Hook function name: role
    Triggered when the hire of the follower ends.
    RoleEvent.FollowerHireEvent
    Hook function name: role
    Triggered when the follower is hired by the player, or the hire is renewed.
    RoleEvent.MailmanEvent
    Hook function name: role
    Triggered when the mailman sends a mail for the player.
    RoleEvent.TradeFailedEvent
    Hook function name: role
    Triggered when a trade between the trader and the player fails.
    RoleEvent.TraderEvent
    Hook function name: role
    Triggered when a trade between the trader and the player succeeds.
    RoleEvent.TransporterUnlockedEvent
    Hook function name: role
    Triggered when the transporter is unlocked for the player.
    RoleEvent.TransporterUseEvent
    Hook function name: role
    Triggered when the player uses the transporter.
    WorldEvent
    Represents a world event triggered on any scripts.
    WorldEvent.EntitySpawnEvent
    Deprecated.
    Removed in 1.12.2-23jul18snapshot
    WorldEvent.ScriptTriggerEvent
    Hook function name: trigger
    Triggered when the trigger() method is called on the scripted object, or the /noppes script trigger command is executed on the scripted object.
